thread.title: Liverpool fans can't handle it as Jamie Carragher tweets picture of himself in an EVERTON shirt
thread.title_full: Liverpool fans can't handle it as Jamie Carragher tweets picture of himself in an EVERTON shirt

author: Mark Jones
title: Liverpool fans can't handle it as Jamie Carragher tweets picture of himself in an EVERTON shirt
text:
Sport Liverpool fans can't handle it as Jamie Carragher tweets picture of himself in an EVERTON shirt Just when Reds fans thought things had got as bad as possible, Carra goes and dons the shirt of their hated rivals... and boyhood favourites Share Why, Jamie? Why wold you do that do them? (Photo: @Carra23 Twitter / Sky Sports) Share Get Liverpool     
Now everyone knows that Jamie Carragher grew up as an Everton fan. This isn't news. 
The former Liverpool defender and current Sky Sports pundit has rightly received huge praise for both his analytical skills on the television and savage takedowns of whoever he comes across on Twitter, usually Gary Neville. 
But with the Reds in a severe slump and fresh off the back of a 3-1 defeat at Leicester City on Monday, he could have timed this better. 
On Tuesday afternoon, Carragher tweeted a picture of himself in an Everton kit as part of a Sky Sports interview he was doing with Blues' star striker Romelu Lukaku. 
And it is safe to say that - on top of everything else at the moment - Reds fans just didn't need to see that... 
Talk about kicking people when they're down... Like us on Facebook
